bug.author: JoanFM
bug.summary: PyClientRunTime timeout is not enough (maybe needs to be configurable)
bug.description: Describe the bug PyClientRuntime has a timeout before it shuts down of 10 seconds. This is not enough to wait for the 1st search request to a FaissIndexer, where the FaissIndex is actually built in memory. Relates to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/examples/pull/318>jina-ai/examples#318</denchmark-link>
